verses.name: John 6:25
verses.text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea, they said unto him, Rabbi, when camest thou hither?

verses.name: John 6:26
verses.text: Jesus answered them and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Ye seek me, not because ye saw the miracles, but because ye did eat of the loaves, and were filled.

verses.name: John 6:27
verses.text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life, which the Son of man shall give unto you: for him hath God the Father sealed.
